walnut.name: Walnut

ponderosa.description: Explore our Ponderosa model, a thoughtfully designed home featuring two bedrooms, one bath, and a dedicated office. With an optional covered patio and a smart, efficient layout, Ponderosa offers the perfect blend of comfort, flexibility, and functional living space
